Introducing "Gatherd," a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your cooking experience and streamline your meal preparation. With Gatherd, you can transform any recipe you find on Pinterest into your favorite version, personalized to suit your taste buds. When logged in to your Pinterest account, the extension will analyze the recipe's ingredients and present you with various customization options. Whether you want to make it healthier, vegan, or adapt it to specific dietary restrictions, Gatherd has got you covered. Say goodbye to endless scrolling through different recipes; now, you can have your ideal version with just a few clicks.

But that's not all! Gatherd is more than just a recipe customization tool. It simplifies your grocery shopping too. Once you've finalized your personalized recipe, the extension automatically generates a comprehensive grocery list from the ingredients required. No more manual note-taking or flipping between recipe pages and shopping lists. With the grocery list at your fingertips, you can quickly check off items you already have and head to the store with a well-organized list of everything you need.

To take your convenience even further, Gatherd integrates seamlessly with Instacart and Kroger. After creating your grocery list, you can export the items directly to your Instacart cart or Kroger account. With a simple click, your selected items will be added, and you can choose to have them delivered to your doorstep or ready for pickup. Embrace the future of meal planning and grocery shopping with Gatherd - the ultimate time-saving Chrome extension for Pinterest users and cooking enthusiasts alike.
